data.title: Celebrate Santorini with our list of movies filmed on the island

data.text:
Have you ever dreamt of visiting the stunning island of Santorini in Greece? Until being able to get there in reality, why not transport yourself to the beautiful landscapes by watching movies that were filmed there?

From romantic comedies to intense thrillers, here are some movies that boast breathtaking views of Santorini:

Lara Croft Tomb Raider (2003)

In this action-packed adventure, Lara Croft travels to Santorini in search of a powerful artifact. Along the way, she must outwit and defeat dangerous enemies while also taking in stunning views of the island.

The Sisterhood of the Traveling Pants (2005)

A heart-warming coming-of-age story of a group of teenage friends who spend their summer apart but stay connected through a pair of magical jeans. As they explore love and self-discovery, one friend travels to Santorini where she finds love and adventure.

The Sisterhood of the Traveling Pants 2 (2008)

In the sequel to The Sisterhood of the Traveling Pants, the friends reunite in Santorini where they navigate heartbreak and new beginnings while also exploring the beautiful island.

Summer Lovers (1982)

In this steamy romance, a couple who travels to Santorini becomes involved in a love triangle with a free-spirited local. As they explore their desires and relationships, they are also enchanted by the stunning scenery of Santorini.

D’ Agostino (2011)

An Italian film presenting the story of a group of friends taking a vacation to Santorini where they encounter love, betrayal, and self-discovery. The stunning scenery of the island serves as the perfect backdrop for the drama unfolding among friends.

Santorini Blue (2013)

In this romantic drama, a man searching for answers to his past travels to Santorini where he meets and falls in love with a woman. As they explore their feelings for each other and the stunning island, secrets from the past are revealed.

So settle in with some Santorini wine and Greek snacks as you enjoy these movies that showcase the beauty of Santorini. Happy viewing!

P.S. And now that you’ve seen these movies, why not add Santorini to your bucket list???
